sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, ROWNUM rn FROM ( SELECT CRN crn, SUBJECT_NAME subjectName, OFFICE officeName, CLIENT_NAME clientName, CASE_RECEIVED_DATE caseReceivedDate, CASE_DUE_DATE caseDueDate, TOTAL totalDays, CASE_MANAGER caseManager, MAIN_ANALYST analystName FROM DW_ONHOLD_CASES ORDER BY caseManager ) a WHERE ROWNUM <= #limit#) WHERE rn >= #start#
